lead_paragraph: Willian scored twice as leader Chelsea overcame Stoke 4-2 to equal an English Premier League record for 13 straight wins in a single season.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Defeats Stoke to Claim 13th Successive EPL Win
headline.main: Chelsea Defeats Stoke to Claim 13th Successive EPL Win

snippet: Willian scored twice as leader Chelsea overcame Stoke 4-2 to equal an English Premier League record for 13 straight wins in a single season....
